name: Iphone 12 Pro Max
description: A smartphone is a mobile device that combines cellular and mobile computing functions into one unit.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra features a 108MP camera and 8K video recording.

name: MacBook Pro 16-inch
description: The MacBook Pro 16-inch offers incredible performance and a stunning Retina display.

name: Apple Watch Series 6
description: The Apple Watch Series 6 monitors your blood oxygen level with a revolutionary sensor and app.

name: Dell XPS 13
description: The Dell XPS 13 is a high-performance laptop with an InfinityEdge display.

name: Google Pixel 5
description: The Google Pixel 5 offers 5G speed, a long-lasting battery, and wireless charging.

name: Sony PlayStation 5
description: The PlayStation 5 offers lightning-fast loading with an ultra-high-speed SSD.

name: Amazon Echo Dot (4th Gen)
description: The Echo Dot is a smart speaker with Alexa voice control.

name: Fitbit Charge 4
description: The Fitbit Charge 4 tracks your activity and sleep with built-in GPS.

name: Canon EOS R5
description: The Canon EOS R5 offers 45MP full-frame CMOS sensor and 8K video.

name: Microsoft Surface Pro 7
description: The Surface Pro 7 is an ultra-light and versatile 2-in-1 laptop.

name: Nikon Z6
description: The Nikon Z6 offers full-frame mirrorless capabilities with 24.5MP sensor.
